resources.string: Your calibration settings are invalid. Please manually configure settings or run the Calibration Wizard.
It is recommended that you run the Calibration Wizard or manually configure your Settings now.
Your preferences are not compatible with this version of ElectricSleep.
You have not yet calibrated ElectricSleep to work on your device.

The calibration will begin after a 5 second delay, and will last exactly 10 seconds if everything works. Gently move ONCE then remain still until you are informed by a voice that the test is over. Press next when you are ready.
This test will calibrate the minimum amount of movement that it takes for ElectricSleep to trigger a wake-up alarm.
This test will calibrate the maximum amount of movement that ElectricSleep will record. It is important for showing concise and informative sleep movement charts.

Generally, it is best to place your device as out of the way as possible, yet close enough so that it will move slightly when you move. If you charge your device during the night, covering it may cause it to overheat. At this time, situate yourself and your device.

The calibration will begin after a 5 second delay, and will last exactly 30 seconds if everything works. Try to remain completely still until you are informed by a voice that the test is over. Press next when you are ready.
Use Moderator to ask questions during this session, and vote up/down other questions.
Use Wave to collaborate in real-time with others during this session.
The official Google Moderator app is available in Market, would you like to install it or continue using a normal browser?
The Google Wave mobile interface is still in beta, and using a desktop or laptop is recommended for the best experience.\n\nContinue to Google Wave anyway?
Are you sure you want to discard this note, deleting any contents?
Select to interrupt or view progress
ElectricSleep has not been recording movement long enough for this chart to be meaningful yet. Please wait.
Filters out \'noise\' non-movements so they do not visually distort movement charts. Change ONLY if automatic calibration is not acceptable.
Limits large movements so they do not visually distort movement charts. Change ONLY if automatic calibration is not acceptable.
Minimum level of movement that will trigger alarm to go off. Change ONLY if automatic calibration is not acceptable.

This test will calibrate the cut-off level for movement \'noise\' that occurs when there is very little human-discernable movement going on. This test will provide the baseline for showing when you are NOT moving during sleep.

This wizard will guide you through calibrating ElectricSleep to work with your device. This is necessary because there are many different android devices and even more places to sleep. At the end of the wizard, ElectricSleep will be configured to record your movement during sleep accurately.

The calibration will begin after a 5 second delay, and will last exactly 10 seconds if everything works. Continuously move, roll, and flop about until you are informed by a voice that the test is over. Press next when you are ready.
